description: NXGEN is a leading regional integrated infocommunications solutions provider. At NXGEN, we put our customers first and help them navigate their digital transformation with ease. We recognise the importance of connecting people to foster collaboration and build relationships that last, and we empower their business by providing innovative solutions and technical expertise. Our commitment to honouring our word is integral to everything we do. NXGEN is a wholly-owned subsidiary of TeleChoice International Limited, a publicly listed company. enhanced_description: NXGEN, a wholly-owned subsidiary of TeleChoice International Limited and a portfolio company of ST Telemedia, is a leading regional integrated infocommunications solutions provider. They specialize in helping organizations navigate their digital transformation by offering innovative solutions and technical expertise. Their core offerings include Robotic Process Automation (RPA), Customer Relationship Management (CRM), and Hybrid Cloud Computing. NXGEN is particularly focused on HR technology, providing solutions related to Machine Learning HR and other HR software and services, with a stated objective to improve employee happiness and engagement, foster company culture, and empower employees.
